name: 2021 7th International Conference on Robotics and Artificial Intelligence
content: Publicationï¼š Accepted and presented papers in ICRAI 2021 will be published by International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM (ISBN: 978-1-4503-8585-5), which will be submitted for ACM Digital Library inclusion and Ei Compendex, Scopus index, etc. The previous conference proceedings have already been included in ACM Digital Library, indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, etc.
